steps.intro: Welcome to the Dice Throne 1v1 tutorial. Reduce your opponent to 0 Health before they do the same to you.
steps.stats: This panel shows your resources: Health (starts at 50) and CP (starts at 2, max 15). Most healing caps at starting Health +10.
steps.phases: Turn order lives here: Upkeep ‚Üí Income ‚Üí Main 1 ‚Üí Offensive Roll ‚Üí Defensive Roll ‚Üí Main 2 ‚Üí Discard. The first player skips Income on their first turn.
steps.playerBoard: This is your player board: ability slots and upgrades live here, and ready abilities can be activated from this area.
steps.tipBoard: This tip board shows your hero reference and ability requirements; you can expand or collapse it anytime.
steps.dice: Your dice tray. You may roll up to 3 times each turn and lock dice you want to keep.
steps.rollButton: Use ‚ÄúRoll‚Äù to start rolling. When you‚Äôre satisfied or out of rolls, move to confirm.
steps.confirmButton: Confirm locks the result so you can pick a skill. If you want another roll, don‚Äôt confirm yet.
steps.abilities: Highlighted abilities are available to use. Pick one to begin attack resolution.
steps.hand: Your hand lives here. In Main phases you can play action cards or upgrades, or sell cards for CP.
steps.discard: This is the discard pile. Drag a card here to sell it for +1 CP.
steps.statusTokens: Status effects and tokens live here. Spend Evasive/Taiji/Purify at the right time; pay 2 CP before offense to remove Knockdown.
steps.advance: Use the Next Phase button to move forward. Enter offensive roll and then roll dice.
steps.resolveAttack: After choosing an offensive ability, click ‚ÄúResolve Attack‚Äù to apply damage and open defense if needed.
steps.taijiResponse: You now have 1 Taiji. The response window shows available tokens; in this tutorial, just review it and close the window.
steps.evasiveResponse: You now have 1 Evasive. The response window shows available tokens; in this tutorial, just review it and close the window.
steps.purifySetup: We applied Knockdown and granted you 1 Purify token.
steps.innerPeace: You received Inner Peace. Play it to gain 2 Chi.
steps.playSix: You received Play Six. Use it during offensive roll to set a die to 6.
steps.meditation2: You received Meditation II. Drag it onto Meditation to upgrade.
steps.defenseRoll: In the defense roll phase, the defender rolls once and can select a defensive ability.
steps.defenseEnd: When defense is complete, the defender clicks ‚ÄúEnd Defense‚Äù to finish damage resolution and move on.
steps.finish: That‚Äôs the 1v1 core flow. Try activating abilities, playing cards, and defeating your opponent!

knockdown.name: Knockdown
description: Before the Offensive Roll Phase, you may spend 2 CP to remove this token
If not removed, you must skip the phase and remove this token
knockdown.clickToRemove: Click to spend 2 CP to remove

burn.name: Burn
description: During Upkeep, the affected player takes 2 undefendable damage.

stun.name: Stun
description: The affected player skips their next offensive roll phase and main phase.
Remove this token at the end of that phase.

concussion.name: Concussion
description: At the start of your Income phase, skip that phase and remove this token.

daze.name: Daze
description: After your attack ends, gain an extra attack and remove this token.

poison.name: Poison
description: At the start of your turn, take damage equal to the number of stacks, then remove 1 stack

confirmRemoveKnockdown.title: Remove Knockdown?
confirmRemoveKnockdown.description: Spend 2 CP to remove Knockdown, allowing you to proceed with the Offensive Roll Phase this turn.

taiji.name: Taiji
description: At any time, spend 1 Taiji to reduce incoming damage by 1
Before attacking, spend 1 Taiji to increase damage by 1
Taiji gained this turn cannot be used to boost damage this turn

evasive.name: Evasive
description: When taking damage, you may spend 1 Evasive and roll 1 die
On 1-2, damage becomes 0 (other effects still apply)
You may spend multiple Evasive to retry in the same attack

purify.name: Purify
description: At any time, spend 1 Purify to remove 1 negative status token

fire_mastery.name: Fire Mastery
description: During Upkeep, remove 1 Fire Mastery token (cooldown).

sneak.name: Sneak
description: When you would take damage, remove this token to prevent that damage

sneak_attack.name: Sneak Attack
description: When dealing damage, roll 1 die and add the result to your damage

purify.title: Use Purify
